wikipedia_page.main:
Clive Leo McNeir is a linguist and lexicographer, and author of a series of crime novels, set mainly on the inland waterways of Britain. As director of The European Language Initiative, he compiled and edited 12 dictionaries in 15 languages, including English, since the first one was published by Cassell in 1993.
NEIR
